text: Middlesex County is located in the south central part of the U.S. State of Connecticut. As of the 2020 census, the population was 164,245. The county has a total area of 1,137 km² (439 mi²). 956 km² (369 mi²) of it is land and 181 km² (70 mi²) of it is water. The total area is 15.90% water. == Cities and Towns == * Chester Center * Chester * Clinton * Cromwell * Deep River Center * Deep River * Durham * East Haddam * East Hampton * Essex Village * Essex * Fenwick * Haddam * Higganum * Killingworth * Lake Pocotopaug * Middlefield * Middletown * Moodus * Old Saybrook Center * Old Saybrook * Portland * Saybrook Manor * Westbrook Center * Westbrook == References == Category:Connecticut counties Category:1785 establishments in the United States Category:1780s establishments in Connecticut
title: Middlesex County, Connecticut
